name: amazon-fba-cashflow
description: Amazon FBA Cashflow planning (static) with Netlify Functions storage

scripts.test:parity: node --test src/domain/parity.golden.test.js src/domain/cashflow.fixcost.test.js src/domain/inventoryProjection.test.js src/domain/outflowStack.test.js src/domain/vatPreview.test.js src/domain/foSuggestion.test.js && npm run test:parity:migration
